title: Braskem Seeks to Unveil Debt Restructuring Plan in Coming Months
description: Braskem SA is aiming to present an out-of-court restructuring plan to creditors by March as it moves to address its mounting debt woes, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: Braskem SA is aiming to present an out-of-court restructuring plan to creditors by March as it moves to address its mounting debt woes, according to people familiar with the matter.
